title.rendered: This is how the classification table for the Qatar 2022 World Cup was left

content.rendered:
Despite having beaten Venezuela by the slightest difference (1-0), The Colombian National Team ran out of options to go to the Qatar 2022 World Cup after Peru defeated Paraguay in Lima.

Colombia added 23 points and was in sixth positionjust one unit from Peru, a team that will wait for a rival to play the World Cup playoff, possibly Australia.

see here

And it is that football charged the Tricolor its irregularity during the Qualifiers, suffering goals against Ecuador and Uruguaybut also painful defeats against Peru at the Metropolitano de Barranquilla, home of the Colombian National Team.

For their part, the Peruvians came from behind in the Qualifiers, as they started in a bad way, although they managed to reinvent themselves under the command of the coach Ricardo Gareca and now they celebrate their advance to the playoffs.

Brazil and Argentinathe two strongest teams in the Qualifiers, They showed that they are at another level by reaching the end of the tournament without losing a match.

Uruguay and their ‘charrúa claw’ became evident in the last games and after beating Peru they confirmed their presence in Qatar 2022.

For its part, Chililike Colombia, he suffered through the Qualifiers that marked the end of his ‘golden generation’.

Finally, Bolivia, Paraguay and Venezuelathe last three in the table, finished the Qualifiers with new coaches, thus marking a renewal of both their football and their players.

See below the table of the Qualifiers for the Qatar 2022 World Cup:

Final table of the Qualifiers for Qatar 2022
